name: Alice
description: A curious young girl who follows a white rabbit down a fantastical hole.

name: Mad Hatter
description: A tea-loving inhabitant of Wonderland with nonsensical riddles and pronouncements.

name: Cheshire Cat
description: A grinning feline who appears and disappears mysteriously, offering cryptic advice.

name: Queen of Hearts
description: A tyrannical ruler, quick to order beheadings for the slightest offense.

name: White Rabbit
description: A nervous creature always running late, who leads Alice to Wonderland.
